name: Cupid's Lemmings
description:
Play as Cupid using your bow to shoot arrows to make people fall in love. The objective is to populate the world with as many people as possible while also stopping them from walking off the edge of the world

Controls
  • Move with WASD
  • Sprint with SHIFT
  • Draw back arrow with Right-Click
  • Shoot arrow with Left-Click
  • Pause with ESC
